Text.Page: Feeling brave, <PCNAME>? I need someone to rescue some relics from the {@Rgn:9017001$$Lighthouse of the Sun}. Up for it?

The worker golems have started moving every relic they dig up into the lighthouse for safety.

That would be fine, but the combat golems inside often damage them! Go inside and rescue a few artifacts.

Oh, look at these!

A few slates of wisdom, some statues...these are beautiful.

Nature smiles, . That was good work.
Rescue those relics before the golems get at them!

Let's see what you found.

Hmm. Several scrolls, a vase, and...whatever this is.

The Mysterium will love it. Thanks again!
Rescue those relics before the golems get at them!

Aaah, and what did you find?

Oh, these are golem instruction discs! The Consos will know what to do with them.

A great day's work, !
Rescue those relics before the golems get at them!
